posts.post_content:

Fred Merkle Portrait Piedmont 350 PSA 4 $52 SOLD
Ed Walsh Piedmont 150 PSA 3 $130 SOLD
Rube Oldering Batting Piedmont 350-460 PSA 3 $42 SOLD
Tim Jordon Portrait Sweet Caporal 150 PSA 3 $40 SOLD
Johnny Bates Piedmont 150 PSA 2 $32  SOLD
Prices include shipping I accept paypal or postal money order.

ALL CARDS HAVE SOLD. THANKS TO ALL. Daryl
Walsh and Merkle are sold will take $100.00 shipped for the last 3 Jordan, Bates and Oldering. Thanks Daryl
